If Markdown tables are used to store data, why not directly visualizing it?

LiaScript offers 10 different types of plots, the best type is automatically chosen, based on the format of a table and its values... but you are free to use your desired one ;-)

You can use this this example as a basis for your own course by following this
[link](https://liascript.github.io/LiveEditor/?)

... Or experiment with it in the LiveEditor below:

<iframe loading="lazy" class="liveeditor" src="https://liascript.github.io/LiveEditor/?"></iframe>
